sqlMap.sql: t.CARD_SUBCLASS, t.CARD_SUBCLASS_NAME, t.CARD_CLASS, t.BIN_NO, t.CARD_ISSUER, t.FACE_VALUE, t.MEMB_LEVEL, t.PT_OPENCARD, t.MEMB_CLASS, t.DISCNT_CLASS, t.FREQUENCY_CLASS, t.PT_CLASS, t.COUPON_CLASS, t.CARD_PRICE, t.BUY_PRICE_MAX, t.BUY_PRICE_MIN, t.CHK_PWD, t.PWD_TYPE, t.PWD, t.EXTEN_ULIMIT, t.EXTEN_LLIMIT, t.CHK_PFCARD, t.AUTO_CANCEL_FLAG, t.CREDIT_ULIMIT, t.CHARGE_ULIMIT, t.CONSM_ULIMIT, t.EFF_PERIOD, t.EXTEN_PERIOD, t.EXTEN_MAXCNT, t.MUST_EXPIR_DATE, t.EXPIR_MTHD, t.EXPIR_DATE, t.STATUS, t.UPDATE_BY, t.UPDATE_TIME, t.IC_TYPE, t.IC_MODEL_NO, t.CHANGE_FACE_VALUE, t.DEPOSIT_FLAG, t.IS_CHG_PWD,t.E_COUPON_TYPE
sqlMap.select: select , c.CARD_TYPE_NAME from CARD_SUB_CLASS_DEF t, CARD_TYPE_CODE c where t.CARD_CLASS = c.CARD_TYPE_CODE and t.CARD_SUBCLASS = #cardSubclass:VARCHAR#
select from CARD_SUB_CLASS_DEF t where t.CARD_SUBCLASS = #cardSubclass:VARCHAR# for update
sqlMap.update: update CARD_SUB_CLASS_DEF set CARD_SUBCLASS_NAME = #cardSubclassName:VARCHAR#, CARD_CLASS = #cardClass:CHAR#, BIN_NO = #binNo:CHAR#, CARD_ISSUER = #cardIssuer:VARCHAR#, FACE_VALUE = #faceValue:DECIMAL#, MEMB_LEVEL = #membLevel:CHAR#, PT_OPENCARD = #ptOpencard:DECIMAL#, MEMB_CLASS = #membClass:VARCHAR#, DISCNT_CLASS = #discntClass:VARCHAR#, FREQUENCY_CLASS = #frequencyClass:VARCHAR#, PT_CLASS = #ptClass:VARCHAR#, COUPON_CLASS = #couponClass:VARCHAR#, CARD_PRICE = #cardPrice:DECIMAL#, BUY_PRICE_MAX = #buyPriceMax:DECIMAL#, BUY_PRICE_MIN = #buyPriceMin:DECIMAL#, CHK_PWD = #chkPwd:DECIMAL#, PWD_TYPE = #pwdType:CHAR#, PWD = #pwd:VARCHAR#, EXTEN_ULIMIT = #extenUlimit:DECIMAL#, EXTEN_LLIMIT = #extenLlimit:DECIMAL#, CHK_PFCARD = #chkPfcard:DECIMAL#, AUTO_CANCEL_FLAG = #autoCancelFlag:DECIMAL#, CREDIT_ULIMIT = #creditUlimit:DECIMAL#, CHARGE_ULIMIT = #chargeUlimit:DECIMAL#, CONSM_ULIMIT = #consmUlimit:DECIMAL#, EFF_PERIOD = #effPeriod:DECIMAL#, EXTEN_PERIOD = #extenPeriod:DECIMAL#, EXTEN_MAXCNT = #extenMaxcnt:DECIMAL#, MUST_EXPIR_DATE = #mustExpirDate:CHAR#, EXPIR_MTHD = #expirMthd:CHAR#, EXPIR_DATE = #expirDate:CHAR#, STATUS = #status:CHAR#, UPDATE_BY = #updateBy:VARCHAR#, UPDATE_TIME = #updateTime:TIMESTAMP#, IC_TYPE = #icType:VARCHAR#, IC_MODEL_NO = #icModelNo:VARCHAR#, CHANGE_FACE_VALUE = #changeFaceValue:CHAR#, DEPOSIT_FLAG = #depositFlag:CHAR#, IS_CHG_PWD = #isChgPwd:CHAR#, E_COUPON_TYPE = #ecouponType:CHAR# where CARD_SUBCLASS = #cardSubclass:VARCHAR#
sqlMap.select: select , c.CARD_TYPE_NAME from CARD_SUB_CLASS_DEF t ,CARD_TYPE_CODE c where t.CARD_CLASS = c.CARD_TYPE_CODE and t.CARD_ISSUER = #cardIssuer# and t.CARD_CLASS <> '10'

select CARD_SUBCLASS, CARD_SUBCLASS_NAME from CARD_SUB_CLASS_DEF
CARD_ISSUER = #cardIssuer#
CARD_CLASS = #cardClass#
MUST_EXPIR_DATE >= #mustExpirDate#
BIN_NO = #binNo#

select , c.CARD_TYPE_NAME from CARD_SUB_CLASS_DEF t left join branch_info br on br.branch_code = t.CARD_ISSUER , CARD_TYPE_CODE c where t.CARD_CLASS = c.CARD_TYPE_CODE
t.CARD_SUBCLASS like #cardSubclass#
t.CARD_SUBCLASS_NAME like #cardSubclassName#
t.MEMB_CLASS = #membClass#
t.DISCNT_CLASS = #discntClass#
t.FREQUENCY_CLASS = #frequencyClass#
t.PT_CLASS = #ptClass#
t.COUPON_CLASS = #couponClass#
t.CARD_CLASS = #cardClass#
t.CARD_ISSUER = #cardIssuer#
t.BIN_NO = #binNo#
t.STATUS = #status#
#fenzhiList[].branchCode#
t.CARD_ISSUER in (select RESP_ORG from BRANCH_PROXY where PROXY_ID = #sellBranch# and STATUS = '00' and PROXY_TYPE = '22')
trim(t.CARD_ISSUER) in (select trim(BRANCH_CODE) from CARD_TO_MERCH where trim(MERCH_ID) = #merchantNo# and STATUS = '00')
t.MUST_EXPIR_DATE >= #startDate#
t.MUST_EXPIR_DATE <= #endDate#
#cardBranchList[].branchCode#
#ids[]#
order by t.UPDATE_TIME desc, t.CARD_ISSUER, t.CARD_CLASS, t.BIN_NO
select count(1) from card_sub_class_def t where t.card_subclass_name = #cardSubclassName:VARCHAR#
